title: Data Visualization
text: Turning Food Waste into Personal Care Solutions

title: Polytechnic Project
text: Prior to entering SIT, I was enrolled in NYP Business Intelligence and Analytics diploma program. This foundation equipped me with analytical skills and data-driven thinking that continue to shape my approach to problem-solving.

title: Data Visualization
text:
ğŸ¯ Project Overview

In this project, my classmate and I were paired with three students from the science school. Our mission was to develop an innovative solution to help reduce food waste in Singapore.

title: Data Visualization
text:
ğŸ’¡ Our Solution


â™»ï¸ From Waste to Wellness


We developed a sustainable hand sanitizer by collecting:



Sugarcane resin from local sugarcane stores


Orange peels from iJooz outlets



These materials were transformed into an effective hand sanitizer, marketed during the COVID-19 period to meet the high demand for hygiene products.

title: Data Visualization
text:
ğŸ“Š Consumer Insights




Data Visualization Poster



Figure 1: Consumer preferences survey results showing preferences for scented vs.Â unscented hand sanitizer and desired product consistency



Key Findings
The data visualization above reveals important consumer feedback regarding:

Scent preferences: Whether customers preferred scented or unscented formulations
Product consistency: Consumer opinions on the desired liquidity/texture of the hand sanitizer

These insights guided our product development to better align with market demands.


Project completed as part of interdisciplinary sustainability initiative

title: Polytechnic Project
text: Prior to entering SIT, I was enrolled in NYP Business Intelligence and Analytics diploma program. This foundation equipped me with analytical skills and data-driven thinking that continue to shape my approach to problem-solving.

title: Polytechnic Project
text:
ğŸŒ± The Sustainability Challenge


Year 2 Collaborative Project


During our second year, we were tasked with an exciting interdisciplinary challenge: collaborating with students from the science school to create a sustainable product that could help reduce food waste in Singapore.


This project brought together our business analytics expertise with scientific innovation to address a real-world environmental concern.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text: For this project, I utilized Claude as my GenAI tool to enhance the visual appeal of my website. Claudeâ€™s ability to generate sophisticated CSS styling and provide design guidance made it the perfect assistant for this creative endeavor.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text: For this project, I utilized Claude as my GenAI tool to enhance the visual appeal of my website. Claudeâ€™s ability to generate sophisticated CSS styling and provide design guidance made it the perfect assistant for this creative endeavor.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
ğŸ¯ Purpose & Rationale


Why GenAI? I chose to use GenAI for this purpose because it can help provide quick, reusable CSS styling that can make my whole website look more attractive and captivating to users.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
ğŸ”„ The Experience: Benefits & Challenges

The Beneficial Aspect


The most valuable aspect of using GenAI was its ability to generate quick, reusable CSS styling that elevated the entire websiteâ€™s visual appeal. This dramatically reduced development time while maintaining professional quality.


The Challenge


The challenging part was learning to clearly define the design I wanted to adopt. GenAI tools like Claude can generate a wide variety of design styles, and if the prompt is not specific enough, the generated design may not align with my vision.
